Lexington-Fayette.Rood & Riddle Equine Hospital: Rood & Riddle Equine Hospital was established in Lexington, Kentucky in 1986 as a partnership between veterinarians William Rood and Thomas Riddle. It has since grown to a world-renowned facility offering a full range of services for the treatment of horses. They have cared for many famous Thoroughbreds both at the racetrack and on the farm.
